Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
08.05.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
-- Initial updates
... quote = last character of every EDIFACT segement
... ? = Escape charater for the use of separators e.g. ',+,:,?
... temp directory / file name for file with containing CL/LF
-- Error (10) --> Source file does not exists or is empty
-- Error (20) --> Temp file already exists
-- Import soucre file and write contents to BlobField
-- Info (100) --> Source file already contains LF, no need to add LF
-- Error (30) --> Importing source file into Blob failed (Blob is null)
-- Add chr(13)&chr(10) after every existing quote, except the quote is used as
a normal character inside text strings, then the character left from the
quote must by a '?'
-- Write contents of the BlobField back to an ASCII file,now with existing CR/LF
-- Error (40) --> Failed to write temp file
-- I/O operations to overwrite source file with the converted file (incl. CR/LF)
-- Error (50) --> Failed to delete source file
-- Error (60) --> Failed to copy temp file to converted source file
-- Warning (110) --> Failed to delete temp file
-- Extract separators from UNA segment (e.g. :'+.?*)
